nodes.name: Send message and wait for response in Slack

parameters.content:
# Video Uploading Agent

## This Agent is the final computing Agent

### - This agent Takes Researched Data, Templates, SerpAPI for backup Search.

### - The agent then computes all the data and creates captions, title, and tags for the video pending for upload

### - Then the agent asks the human for approval

### - Then the agent Uses Youtube (or any other platform API) to enter all the required details for video uploading and then finally uploades the video.

### - Once  the video uploading is done agent sends a final message to the human on slack telling the confirmed upload and sharing the video link

# Video Creation Agent

## This Agent uses Gemini-3 and creates stunning videos 

- Agent uses templates, supabase researched data & if needed HTTP searches
- After computing all the data it starts writing a prompt for Gemini which later gets passed to gemini-3 for generating high quality videos

# Content Creation & Uploading Agent

## This agent is responsible for generating video content and let user validate the video, if everything is right the agent will move forward and will upload the video using the template and researched data using supabase

### We are using Gemini-3 for video creation

## - once the video is generated the video is sent to human using slack where human may decide to start uploading or video needs improvements.
## - Once user approves for uploading the video is handed over to uploading Agent which generates the text content and captions using templates and researched data and uploads the video
## - Once upload is done the human gets a SLACK notification of confirmation and video link

# Human check for Agent generated video

## Generated video will be sent to the human on SLACK, and human can decide to let the AI post the video, or let the AI know what is wrong and tell it to regenerate with remarks

categories.description: step back and regenerate the video with remarks

parameters.content:
# Human Check for Generated Image content

## Images will be validated by human and if human wants he/she can tell the AI the remarks and it will generate the content again considering those remarks

categories.description: step back and regenerate the content

parameters.content:
# Generating Images

By using Gemini  we are generating:
- Image creation for posts
- Featured image for ads
- Infographics for total information

And after generating the images these will go to human for approval

## Image agents: generate on‑brand images and then apply standard watermark / sizing with Edit Image

# Human Check for SEOs

## Human will recieve the content generate by SEO writing agents, and human can decide to move further and can ask for edits by sending remarks with the message

categories.description: step back and re write the SEOs with user remarks

parameters.content:
## Tools 

Supabase for reading the data base contents before writing SEOs, HTTP for fetching templates & an AI model to compute everything for all the agents
# SEO sub‑agents refine the article: headings, keyword balance, word count, internal links, schema, meta, slug

# Check AI Output

If AI outputs TRUE then everything should go further for human approval, if AI agent outputs False, it will go back to re write the content

# Human Remarks

## Human gets notified of a message and that contains all the info content writer wrote, and if human wants he/she can ask for rewriting content, Do Research Again & All Good Proceed further

# Fact/Content Manager

## Scans all the AI generated contents based on given templates and validates them using the research DATA fetched earilier and outputs TRUE if things are right or maybe there was some minor errors which AI can fix and proceed further. If it outputs False it means that the generated Content & Research has some defects which will make the research agent work again with some remarks that what AI found which thing was wrong

## AI Model & MongoDB Memory

**Claude** is the best reasoning model & MongoDB memory will help AI agent keep the track of all the operations

## Recheck facts/fillers & False information

These allow the agent to research for the specific data AI thinks which might not be valid

## Supabase Actions
This will allow the agent to see through the database and can make slighter changes if require
Aggregate the writer agents output
## FAQ
## Conclusion
## How-we-tested the casino
## Responsible Gambling
## Customer Service / Support
## Withdrawal process + KYC
## License & regulation
## Game + Slot providers
## History about the casino
## Payment methods
## Welcome bonus test
## Headline + Intro + data set
## Headline + Intro + data set

## Writer Agent Tools
- **Tavily** is given so that the AI agent is free to do just in case researh
- **Supabase** is given to read the researched data and store the generated output
- **HTTP** is given so that the AI agent can fetch the Template/Prompt for instructions

# These are specialist analysts: Bonus, Payments, History, Regulation, Games, Withdrawals, Support, Responsible Gambling. Each reads from the shared Supabase research store and produces structured fields for writers. These use brandName & market research to deep down inside the niche

## Merge the output of All AI Agents

by merging and creating a table we can easily process and reuse data in further operations

## Get the supabase data and split it across different agents 

as it is going to decrease the chances of hallucination by using different agents for particular task
## Responsible Gaming Agent (which tools, how)
## Support Agent (FAQ,
## WD Agent
## Slots Agent (Excklusive slots, providers, unsual providers, jackpots, live casino games)
## Regulation Agent
## History Agent (Live, license, ownership)
## Payment Agent
## Bonus Casino Agent (Welcome/Other bonuses/ T&Cs)

# Visual Representation of Data Storage
![Data Representation](https://axshul.github.io/n8n-instances/Screenshot%202026-01-04%20213710.png)
## Supabase

## PAA Using SerpAPI
Fetching PAA list using the SerpAPI with different parameters

## Research Agent 2
Uses SerpAPI To Extract Brand Specific Contents like *welcome bonus, T&Cs, license, local payments.* and with this we get the precise information about brand insights & saves rich metadata in Supabase

## Research Agent 1
R-Agent 1 does the research and evaluates the **top 10** competitors from Google/Bing and scrapes their data and stores the information in a long term *Supabase** storage for reuse, once done it scrapes the insights from top 10 URLs saved in the supabase using SerpAPI and then saves it

## DeepDive
scrape and gets a list of **URLs** which later gets iterated one-by-one using **HTTP** Request which then selects the TOP 10 webpages for deep insight research

## Get Details/Triggers 
Get **brandName**, **market** & **niche**

Which Later Gets Processed by the AI Agent specific to a region *Betsson + Norway* which can be easily scaled up to any specific region or --all

## Temporary Instructions 
This is to tell Ai for the aspects to leave in research until deep search is called
